statements: DELETE FROM VideoFootageMetadata WHERE person_id = 123 AND detected_emotion = 'happy';
DELETE FROM VideoFootageMetadata WHERE location = 'Main Entrance' AND flagged = TRUE;
DELETE FROM VideoFootageMetadata WHERE location = 'Room A' AND people_count > 10;
DELETE FROM FacialRecognition WHERE detected_age < 18 AND confidence < 0.5;
DELETE FROM FacialRecognition WHERE confidence_score > 0.8 AND video_id = 3;
DELETE FROM facial_recognition_results WHERE recognized_faces = ARRAY[]::INT[]
DELETE FROM facial_recognition_results WHERE recognized_faces = ARRAY[1, 2, 3];
